readable.title: 561179890_af8e31cb2e
readable.content: A bearded man with a backpack on his back holding a tripod in front of a rocky creek and bridge . A man dressed in warm clothes stands before a bridge that traverses a river . A man standing in front of a wooden bridge near a rocky river . The man is walking outside near a rocky river . There is a man with a moustache , cap and backpack standing by a bridge that running crosses water .
